name: Antmazon
description:
Play as Antony, a diligent worker ant at Antmazon. Gather enough management potential to meet Jeff BEEzos in his true form, or unionize your coworkers to help take him down. Pee in bottles to stay as healthy as you can , or weaponize  your urine to take the rest of the company down with you.

Made for PB&Jam 2021.

Team:

Jackie Gamby-Haycock

Patrick Lynch, @Raptor7789

Shannyn Boyd, @amoonlessnight
